category.category_uz: Non va non mahsulotlarini ishlab chiqarish

title: Head-up type double speed dough mixer US-SXBP-T6
title_uz: Boshqarish paneli ustki qismida joylashgan xamir uchun mikser US-SXBP-T6
title_ru: Тестомешалка расположена в верхней части панели управления US-SXBP-T6
title_en: Head-up type double speed dough mixer US-SXBP-T6
short_description: This equipment serves for the production of bread and bakery products, that is, it increases the speed of work by mixing the dough of pizza, bread, sweets and similar products. The control panel of this equipment is located in the upper part and its volume is 10L. The mixer weighing 34kg works at 220V voltage and can mix dough up to a maximum weight of 4kg. The size of the equipment is 521*288*508mm.
short_description_uz: Ushbu uskuna non va non mahsulotlari ishlab chiqarish uchun xizmat qiladi, ya'ni pitsa, non, shirinliklar va shunga o'xshash mahsulotlar xamirini aralashtirib ish tezligini oshiradi. Ushbu uskunaning boshqaruv paneli ustki qismida joylashgan va hajmi 10L ni tashkil etadi. Vazni 34kg ni tashkil etuvchi mikser 220V kuchlanishda ishlaydi va maksimal 4kg og'irlikkacha xamirni aralashtira oladi. Uskunaning o'lchami esa 521*288*508mm.
short_description_ru: Данное оборудование служит для производства хлеба и хлебобулочных изделий, то есть увеличивает скорость работы при замешивании теста для пиццы, хлеба, сладостей и подобных изделий. Панель управления данным оборудованием расположена в верхней части, ее объем составляет 10 л. Миксер весом 34 кг работает при напряжении 220 В и может замешивать тесто весом до 4 кг. Размер оборудования 521*288*508мм.
short_description_en: This equipment serves for the production of bread and bakery products, that is, it increases the speed of work by mixing the dough of pizza, bread, sweets and similar products. The control panel of this equipment is located in the upper part and its volume is 10L. The mixer weighing 34kg works at 220V voltage and can mix dough up to a maximum weight of 4kg. The size of the equipment is 521*288*508mm.
long_description:
This equipment serves for the production of bread and bakery products, that is, it increases the speed of work by mixing the dough of pizza, bread, sweets and similar products. The control panel of this equipment is located in the upper part and its volume is 10L. The mixer weighing 34kg works at 220V voltage and can mix dough up to a maximum weight of 4kg. The size of the equipment is 521*288*508mm.

 

Basic parameters
Model US-SXBP-T6
Voltage 220V
Rate frequency 50-60Hz
Input power 1kw
Mixing speed 107/230 r/min
Max. kneading 4kg
Capacity 10L
Dimension 521*288*508mm
Weight 34kg
long_description_uz:
Ushbu uskuna non va non mahsulotlari ishlab chiqarish uchun xizmat qiladi, ya'ni pitsa, non, shirinliklar va shunga o'xshash mahsulotlar xamirini aralashtirib ish tezligini oshiradi. Ushbu uskunaning boshqaruv paneli ustki qismida joylashgan va hajmi 10L ni tashkil etadi. Vazni 34kg ni tashkil etuvchi mikser 220V kuchlanishda ishlaydi va maksimal 4kg og'irlikkacha xamirni aralashtira oladi. Uskunaning o'lchami esa 521*288*508mm.

 

Umumiy parametrlari
Model US-SXBP-T6
Kuchlanishi 220V
Chastota tezligi 50/60Hz
Quvvati 1kw
Aralashtirish tezligi 107/230 r/min
Maks. aralashtirish 3kg
Sig'imi 10L
O'lchami 521*288*508mm
Vazni 34kg
long_description_ru:
Данное оборудование служит для производства хлеба и хлебобулочных изделий, то есть увеличивает скорость работы при замешивании теста для пиццы, хлеба, сладостей и подобных изделий. Панель управления данным оборудованием расположена в верхней части, ее объем составляет 10 л. Миксер весом 34 кг работает при напряжении 220 В и может замешивать тесто весом до 4 кг. Размер оборудования 521*288*508мм.

 

Общие параметры
Модель US-SXBP-T6
Напряжение 220В
Частота 50-60 Гц
Мощность 1 кВт
Скорость смешивания 107/230 об/мин
Макс. смешивание 4 кг
Емкость 10л
Размер 521*288*508мм
Масса 34кг
long_description_en:
This equipment serves for the production of bread and bakery products, that is, it increases the speed of work by mixing the dough of pizza, bread, sweets and similar products. The control panel of this equipment is located in the upper part and its volume is 10L. The mixer weighing 34kg works at 220V voltage and can mix dough up to a maximum weight of 4kg. The size of the equipment is 521*288*508mm.

 

Basic parameters
Model US-SXBP-T6
Voltage 220V
Rate frequency 50-60Hz
Input power 1kw
Mixing speed 107/230 r/min
Max. kneading 4kg
Capacity 10L
Dimension 521*288*508mm
